title: paccai iLam taLir mEni kANa
sahitya:
paccai iLam taLir mEni kANa paNNudavar konja nanjamO


anupallavi

  iccai tavir vAnum kUDa nin nirattai Erkkum engum oLi vIshuginra 
iLa mati tOrkkum gajjai kaTTi ADuginra ninnazhagaik-kaNDAl
			(madhyamakAlam)
kArenu mEghamulavi engaNum muraipaDa muzhangi avaiyArkkum


caraNam    mAmAyai tANDi ninra guNakkaDalE tayir mattaNaiyum kaiyiTraNainda eyir-TrzhilE 
AmArum arindArum aTra nilaiyE attai nAn unakku enrAl pitta nilaiyE
			(madhyamakAlam)
arindu sheidoru pApamilEn enakkadutAn lakSam kOTi Ayinu unadiru padamalar aDiyinai anavaratamum tudi pADi AnandamAnadu kOTi kOTi AghaiyinAl unait-tEDit-tEDi ADiyum pADiyum alaruvadum ara aruLa vENum enai nADi nADi
